name: Eldritch Knight
description: Eldritch Knights blend martial mastery with arcane spellcasting, wielding magic to enhance their combat prowess and versatility.

3.name: Spellcasting
3.description: You augment your martial prowess with the ability to cast spells. You learn wizard spells, primarily from the abjuration and evocation schools, and use Intelligence as your spellcasting ability.

3.name: Weapon Bond
3.description: You learn a ritual that creates a magical bond between you and a weapon. You canâ€™t be disarmed of that weapon unless you are incapacitated, and you can summon it to your hand as a bonus action.

7.name: War Magic
7.description: Starting at 7th level, when you use your action to cast a cantrip, you can make one weapon attack as a bonus action.

10.name: Eldritch Strike
10.description: At 10th level, when you hit a creature with a weapon attack, that creature has disadvantage on the next saving throw it makes against a spell you cast before the end of your next turn.

15.name: Arcane Charge
15.description: Starting at 15th level, when you use your Action Surge, you can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see before or after the additional action.

18.name: Improved War Magic
18.description: At 18th level, when you use your action to cast a spell, you can make one weapon attack as a bonus action.
